EmbedNodeÂ¶

struct asmjit::EmbedNode
#include <compiler.h>

Embed node.

Embed node is used to embed data into final assembler stream. The data is considered to be RAW; No analysis is performed on RAW data.

Public Type

Anonymous enum

Values:

  • kInlineBufferSize = 8 -
Public Functions

EmbedNode(BaseCompiler * compiler, void * data, uint32_t size)

Create a new EmbedNode instance.

~EmbedNode()

Destroy the EmbedNode instance.

uint8_t * getData()

Get pointer to data.

uint32_t getSize()

Get size of data.
